Statute.Title: Budget Implementation Act, 2004, No. 2
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Exécution du budget de 2004, Loi no 2 d’ 2004)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2005, c. 19 in force on assent 13.05.2005

Item.Text: — s. 42(1) is deemed in force 23.03.2004 see s. 42(2)
— ss. 56(1) to (4) are deemed in force 19.06.2003 see s. 56(5)
see also various provisions throughout re application
